title: Chinese Developers Report Sharp Drops in Monthly Home Sales
sub_head: Numerous big developers have recently reported lower sales figures for September
body:
Home sales in China are dropping by a third or more in some cases as curbs on property lending and worries about the financial health of China Evergrande Group and other developers are sidelining house buyers.
In recent days, numerous big developers have reported lower sales figures for September, with many showing year-over-year declines of more than 20% or 30%. That is a stark drop-off for what is usually one of the strongest months in the year, thanks in part to promotions offered around Chinaâ€™s Oct. 1 National Day holiday.
